shapes3d

Class Extrusion

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes3d.Shape3D
      • shapes3d.Mesh2DCore
        • shapes3d.Mesh2DCoreWithCaps
          • shapes3d.Extrusion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PConstants, SConstants

    public class Extrusion
extends Mesh2DCoreWithCaps
    This class represents all shapes that can be created from a 2D contour that moves along a 3D path.
    It requires three pieces of information :-
    1) the path the extrusion takes in 3D space
    2) the shapes contour
    3) the scaling factor to be applied to the contour depending on the distance along the path

    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Constructor Detail

      • Extrusion

        public Extrusion(PApplet app,
         Path path,
         int nbrSlices,
         Contour contour,
         ContourScale contourScale)
        All extrusions are created using this constructor.
        The library provides some predefined classes that you can use as parameters for this constructor.
        They are
        Parameters:
        app - the PApplet object used to draw the shape
        path - the 3D path for the extrusion centre-line
        nbrSlices - the number of slices along the path length
        contour - the cross-sectional shape of the extrusion
        contourScale - the scale to be applied to the contoru.

    • Method Detail
